display_long_description:
# Play as a Super Bird
**I Am Bird** puts you in the wings of a true bird hero. Fly freely through a large city full of quests, activities, and exploration. Experience the life of a super-bird from above as you glide through streets, rooftops, and open skies.
[media]
# Open World
Explore a big, open city filled with activities. The city becomes your playground as you fly wherever you want.
[media]
# Protect the City
Help citizens or your bird crew from danger, and take heroic tasks across the city. Roam the streets and look for justice. Dive, strike, and use your gadgets to keep the city safe from above.
[media]
# Super Bird Skills
Fly, glide, dash, and maneuver. Perform fast turns, sharp dives, and heroic aerial attacks using your unique bird powers.
[media]
# Gadgets & Tools
Equip yourself with a variety of tools designed for a bird hero. Use gadgets to fight enemies, distract threats, solve quests, and assist citizens.
[media]
# Dozens of Activities
Discover side missions, challenges, and fun tasks around the city. From aerial races to rescue missions, every district offers something new to explore.
[media]

**I Am Bird** puts you in the wings of a true bird hero. Fly freely through a large city full of quests, activities, and exploration. Experience the life of a super-bird from above as you glide through streets, rooftops, and open skies.

Explore a big, open city filled with activities. The city becomes your playground as you fly wherever you want.

# Super Bird Skills
Fly, glide, dash, and maneuver. Perform fast turns, sharp dives, and heroic aerial attacks using your unique bird powers.

Equip yourself with a variety of tools designed for a bird hero. Use gadgets to fight enemies, distract threats, solve quests, and assist citizens.

Discover side missions, challenges, and fun tasks around the city. From aerial races to rescue missions, every district offers something new to explore.
